about_the_game:
YOU ARE THE NEXT CHAMPION OF CANAAN
Street Flicker is a skill based PVP/PVE Puzzle Fighter #NoPay2Win. Challenge the world with fast paced free-to-play PVP battles or enjoy playing at your own pace in the fun character driven Single Player - we've included the first four single player levels free! Gain fans and climb the leaderboard with every victory, earn experience and unlock rewards as you play.



TEST YOUR MIGHT
Battles in Street Flicker are fast paced and are completed in under a minute. You fight with a variety of different moves, each of them with their strengths and weaknesses. Upgrade your moves by matching them 3-in-a-row while countering your opponent’s tactics! The more you counter, the more the fight swings in your favor!



CREATE YOUR OWN UNIQUE FIGHTER
Earn words and attributes as you play the game that you can use to at the HERO FORGE to create an avatar for your very own unique fighter! This is a fun cosmetic created with the latest in Generative AI and shows off your style in every battle. Also earn emotes, unique art styles, and fan skins to customize your experience.



FIGHT THROUGH THE STREETS OF CANAAN
Meet new and interesting characters and progress through a purchasable single-player campaign in a quirky character driven experience. Who knows you might recognize somebody!



BECOME THE STREET FLICKER CHAMPION
Climb the global leaderboard and become the best of the best! We will see you at the top!

ABOUT THE DEVELOPERS
We're Alphane and we believe in competitive skill based games. For too long annoying pay-to-win games dominated gaming. Our mission is to make easy-to-pick-up but deep competitive games - follow us and challenge us!

name: Street Flicker

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: The Ultimate PVP/PVE Puzzle Fighter! Challenge the world in this quick-play skill-based game. Or join Matcha Bee in a quirky single player story mode and experience the mean Streets of Canaan! #NoPayToWin
